level.heading: Penalty for unauthorized release of information.
level.text: Any staff member of the Child Protection Register who willfully releases information obtained from the Register in violation of this subchapter shall be fined not more than $1,000.

level.heading: History
level.text: (Sept. 23, 1977, D.C. Law 2-22, title II, ยง 208, 24 DCR 3341.)

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 2-22
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-22, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 4-1301.02.
